list.en: I'll get off work early tomorrow.
Do you know that our company is going to lay off some employees?
list.cn: 你知道我们公司要裁员吗?

list.en: I'll file these letters away.
Can you give me a promotion?
Don't forget to bring a doctor s note in tomorrow.
list.cn: 明天别忘了带医生证明来。

list.en: Would you please think about giving me a raise?
I can't open the file again.
I feel like I am under too much strain these days.
list.cn: 我觉得这些天压力太大了。

list.en: This copier is driving me crazy.
list.cn: 这台复印机快把我逼疯了。

list.en: You'd better clean out all the files.
list.cn: 你最好把所有的文件都清理干净。

list.en: I hope to get a job with opportunity of promotion.
list.cn: 我希望能找到一份有晋升机会的工作。

list.en: Can you work under pressure?
I got fired.
Please file those materials in a drawer.
list.cn: 请把那些材料归档放在抽屉里。

list.en: She was soon transferred to another post.
list.cn: 她很快被调到另一个岗位。

list.en: Have you received the fax?
The traffic was crowded for two hours.
New material should be filed in its proper numerical order.
list.cn: 新材料应按正确的数字顺序归档。

list.en: Could you help me put on the code number of our company please?
list.cn: 你能帮我把我们公司的代码写上去吗?

list.en: How many vacation days do you have?
I was late for work yesterday.
What kind of business will you start?
list.cn: 你打算做什么样的生意?

list.en: I was dismissed.
I need a sick leave for two days.
This is the main message.
This is a fax. Please check.
I'd like to take this afternoon off if it's all right with you.
list.cn: 如果您可以的话，我今天下午想请假。

list.en: Can you give me some reasons for a raise?
list.cn: 你能给我一些加薪的理由吗?

list.en: I honestly hope you can get an ideal job.
list.cn: 我真心希望你能找到一份理想的工作。

list.en: The printer, copier, fax and water dispenser are over there.
list.cn: 打印机、复印机、传真机和饮水机都在那边。

list.en: I have decided to resign.
Is this the code number of the receiver?
Do you have any pressure on work?
May I put in for a transfer?
Remember to save before you exit.
I have to say, your resignation leaving is really a loss of our company.
list.cn: 我不得不说，你的辞职确实是我们公司的损失。

list.en: What you're saying is you're letting me go, right?
list.cn: 你是说你要放我走，对吧?

list.en: Are you a multi tasked individual?
list.cn: 你是一个能同时承担多项任务的人吗?

list.en: Why do you want to start your own business?
I'd really like to start a clothing store.
list.cn: 我真的很想开一家服装店。

list.en: I just got passed over for another promotion, the third one in five years.
list.cn: 我又没能升职，这是五年来的第三次了。
